overview: Stepmom Syren DeMer finds porn in stepdaughter Zoey Taylor's room and learns that Zoey has been harboring a crush on her. Jaye Summers seduces hot stepmom Alana Cruise. Dr. Alana Cruise is having a hell of a time with nervous, younger nurse Zoe Parker, and works to help her get over her anxiety. OBGYN Dana Vespoli finds out that young patient Eliza Jane has a crush on her and wrestles with her code of ethics.
title: Mother Lovers Society 17
